title: Definitions
context: PART I. GENERAL OBLIGATION BONDS ยง47-1 Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Bonds&rdquo; means bonds, notes, and other instruments of indebtedness. &ldquo;County&rdquo; means the counties of Hawaii, Kauai, and Maui and the city and county of Honolulu. &ldquo;Director of finance&rdquo; means the director of finance of each county. &ldquo;Governing body&rdquo; means the council of each county, or any other body exercising the legislative powers of the county. [L 1989, c 80, pt of ยง2]
